title: Systematic Simulation/VR Training Course for Strengthening Competencies of Public Sector Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social work knowledge and intermediate-level job experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation learning environment construction feasible in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings, offering personalized feedback and repeated practice opportunities for learners

learning_goals: Learners can apply decision-making processes with over 85% accuracy in public affairs scenario-based VR simulations
Achieve a goal of reducing individual competency gaps by 30% or more through feedback-driven learning design
Measure a 20% improvement in work efficiency as an educational outcome following systematic instructional design principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
